nmc-title: Since risk cover has been revoked by insurance companies
nmc-chapter: the risk of industrial conflicts and terrorist attacks for the European Parliament buildings needs to be covered through the general budget of the European Union.
nmc-article: The appropriations of this title accordingly cover all expenses in connection with damage resulting from industrial conflicts and terrorist attacks.
